MainHero.title: Hello, I am
MainHero.subtitle: Full Stack Software Developer
MainHero.description: Specializing in web development, desktop applications, and Minecraft development. Crafting digital solutions with passion and creativity.

description.part1: I am <name>Hervis Cortes</name>, a software developer passionate about creating innovative digital solutions. Known online as <alias>GatoArtStudio</alias>, I specialize in web development, desktop applications, and Minecraft development.
description.part2: My journey into programming began with a curiosity to understand how the digital things we use every day work. That curiosity turned into passion, and that passion into a career dedicated to building exceptional digital experiences.
description.part3: When I'm not coding, I enjoy exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, and sharing knowledge with the developer community.

MainSkills.title: My Skills
MainSkills.description: A diverse set of technical and professional skills that enable me to tackle complex projects and deliver high-quality solutions.

features.feature3: Development of plugins and mods for Minecraft
features.feature4: Programming bots for Discord and Twitch

features.feature1: Management and configuration of VPS and Minecraft servers
features.feature3: Automation of tasks and continuous deployment (CI/CD) with DevOps practices

MainTechnologies.title: My Technologies
MainTechnologies.description: Technologies and tools I frequently use to build efficient and scalable applications.

MainProjects.title: My Projects
MainProjects.description: A showcase of some of the most notable projects I've worked on, demonstrating my skills and expertise in software development.

MainFooter.description: Software developer specializing in web, desktop, and Minecraft solutions
